items.label: 579a46de5457a34c48102fd2
items.name: Residential Service
items.description:
This schedule is available to residential customers for all domestic uses in residences, individual family apartments, and private rooming houses.

Energy Efficiency Cost Recovery Rider:Rider Energy Efficiency Cost Recovery Factor (EECRF) recovers the cost of energy efficiency programs not included in base rates and is applicable to the kWh of Retail Customers taking retail service from the Company, for Residential Services this Rate is $0.001163 per kWh. 

Fuel Cost Component of Monthly Rates: In addition to all other charges, the amount of the bill
will be increased by an amount per kWh as provided in the Fixed Fuel Factor schedule, Sheet IV-34.

Additional Components of Monthly Rates: This rate schedule is subject to other applicable rate adjustments in effect from time to time in this tariff.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Fixed Fuel factor + Energy Efficiency Cost Recovery rider + Rate Case Expense surcharge + Transmission Cost Recovery factor
